definitions: The act of placing a crown on someone's head, especially as part of a ceremony to make them king or queen.
The highest or most successful point of something; the culmination.
The appearance of the baby's head at the vaginal opening during childbirth.
examples: The crowning of the new monarch was a grand affair.
Winning the championship was the crowning of his career.
The midwife announced that crowning had begun.
